Insurrection.definition: the act or an instance of revolting esp. violently against civil or political authority or against an established government ;also
Insurrection.origin: [whoever incites, sets on foot, assists, or engages in any rebellion or against the authority of the United States…shall be fined not more than $10,000 or imprisoned not more than ten years " U.S. Code "]

1.1: the act or an instance of revolting esp. violently against civil or political authority or against an established government

2.1: the crime of inciting or engaging in such revolt [whoever incites, sets on foot, assists, or engages in any rebellion or against the authority of the United States…shall be fined not more than $10,000 or imprisoned not more than ten years "
